content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans. I understand that I'm in READ-ONLY mode and cannot create, modify, or delete any files.

Let me get oriented by checking the project structure:

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent && find . -type f -name "package.json" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent && ls -la</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent && cat README.md 2>/dev/null || echo "No README found"</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

I can see this is a monorepo project with:
- A Go backend (`packages/go-backend`)
- A desktop UI (`packages/desktop/ui`)
- Recent changes focusing on UI improvements, provider management, and skill restoration

The git status shows modifications to various Agent UI components and backend changes, with some cleanup of deprecated files.

I'm ready to receive your requirements and perspective for the design task. Please provide:
1. The specific requirements you'd like me to address
2. Any particular perspective or approach you'd like me to take in the design process
